《[[Another_day_comes(专辑)|Another_day_comes]]》
《Breakfast》 }} '''Another_day_comes'''是由日本乐队'''Pay money To my Pain'''作曲演唱的歌曲，并在2007年被[[圆谷株式会社|圆谷公司]]选中作为特摄剧[[奥特曼:赛文X|奥特赛文X]]的主题曲 == 歌曲 == PTP-Another day comes.mp3|loop=yes|autostart=no|parameter=value|bg=0xE60000 == 歌词 == {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#E60000|rstyle=color:#E60000|reserveWidth=420px |original= Another day comes to you My past fades into my memory and it's coming again with his music It wakes me up so slow another day comes This evel that lives in my life It takes me again to where I used to be I'm trying to fight for me For my light,for my life As long as you are here I will SING!! As long as you stand next to me I will SING for you (sing for you) Remember where you come from I'll keep you real so safe so clear I was so afraid go back to that cold world made alone by fear Save me (you say) Kill me (I say) Raze me my mind screaming to me Why do I rush this life? When I could take time to feel my mind？ As long as you are here I will SING!! As long as you stand next to me I will SING this forever (Addicted by my memory no way to free this pain inside of me Addicated to this nightmare this dream always seems to find me) As long as you are here I will SING!! As long as you stand next to me I will SING for you! The music takes me...breaks me as another day comes! The music brings me to a brand new world The music takes me...breaks me as another day comes! The music brinds me brand new days!!! (Addicted by my memory no way to free this pain inside of me Addicated to this nightmare this dream always seems to find me...) |translated= 新的一切已經來臨了.. 我的過往在記憶中消逝 如今他伴隨著他的旋律回來了 喚醒我的步調很沉重 新的一切已經來臨了 常駐在我生命中的惡魔 他再次帶到我到我曾出現的地方 我試著為自己奮鬥 為了自己的路途 為了我的生命 只要你在这儿 我將歌唱！！ 就像你在我身边 我將為你高歌 (為你高歌) 記得你從哪裡來 我將保護你的真實 我害怕回去 到那單獨由恐懼創造的陰冷世界 救贖我(你說) 殺了我(我說) 讓我消失,我的意念正對我發出喊叫 为何這樣魯莽的浪費著生命？ 當我有機會可整頓自我時？ 只要你在这儿 我將歌唱！！ 就像你在我身边 我将永远为你歌唱 (毒癮般的習慣了忘卻許多事情 來釋放我自身所有的苦痛 也早已習慣了所有 看起來經常像在找尋我的夢靨與夢...) 只要你在这儿 我將歌唱！！ 就像你在我身边 我將為你高歌！ 那樂音 帶著我...將我淨化 新的一切已經來臨了！ 那樂音帶著我到了一個令人深深銘記的新世界 那樂音 帶著我...將我淨化 新的一切已經來臨了！ 那樂音帶著我到了一個令人深深銘記的新世界 (毒癮般的習慣了忘卻許多事情 來釋放我自身所有的苦痛 也早已習慣了 我所有 看起來經常像在找尋我的夢靨與夢...) }} == 相关链接 == PTP的网页 http://www.paymoneytomypain.com/ {{Ultra系列}} [[分类:日本音乐作品]]
